com.percussion.services.assembly
Interface IPSTemplateBinding

public interface IPSTemplateBinding

A binding describes the pairing of a variable to bind with an expression to evaluate.

Author:
dougrand

Field Summary
static Set<String> SYSTEM_VARIABLES
          Names of system variables.
 
Method Summary
 String getExpression()
          The expression to be evaluated
 String getVariable()
          The variable to be bound.
 

Field Detail

static final Set<String> SYSTEM_VARIABLES
Names of system variables.

Method Detail

getVariable

String getVariable()
The variable to be bound.

Returns:
the variable. Can be null or empty if the expression should be executed and its returned value should be discarded.

getExpression

String getExpression()
The expression to be evaluated

Returns:
the expression, never null or empty
